article_title: Auto Makers Sued in South Korea Over Fuel Economy
article_text:
SEOUL—In a rare showing of consumer activism in South Korea, a group of more than 1,700 consumers filed suit against Hyundai Motor Co. and five other auto makers Monday for overstating the fuel economy of their vehicles.

The plaintiffs, in a lawsuit that marked only the third ever South Korean group action against the auto industry, said the vehicles they purchased had inflated mileages, resulting in higher-than-estimated fuel costs...
